class.name: PhysicsShapeCollisionResult2D
class.brief_description: Stores the collision points of a shape intersection query.
class.description: This class contains the contact points computed by [method PhysicsDirectSpaceState3D.collide_shape]. Each collision is represented as a pair of points: one on the queried shape and one on the colliding shape.

method.name: get_collision_point_a
method.description: Returns the collision point on the queried shape for the collision at the given index.

method.name: get_collision_point_b
method.description: Returns the collision point on the colliding shape for the collision at the given index.

members.member: The number of shapes that collide with the queried shape.
The maximum number of collisions this object can store.
